alert.note: Alert for Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 2:59PM CDT until June 30 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Tallapoosa County in east central Alabama... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 259 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jacksons` Gap, or 7 miles north of Dadeville, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Alexander City, Dadeville, Jacksons` Gap, New Site, Hillabee Creek, Eastern Lake Martin, Western Lake Martin, Northern Lake Martin, Southern Lake Martin, Wind Creek State Park, Still Waters Resort, Susannah Crossing, Maxwell Gunter Recreation Area, Blue Creek Marina, Horseshoe Bend National Military Park, Hackneyville, Dare Park, Eagle Creek, Horseshoe Bend and Yates Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
